mapper.select: select c.id, c.title, s1.title as subjectParentTitle, s2.title as subjectTitle, t.name as teacherName, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, c.price, c.cover, c.buy_count as buyCount, c.view_count as viewCount, c.status, c.gmt_create as gmtCreate from edu_course c left join edu_teacher t on c.teacher_id = t.id left join edu_subject s1 on c.subject_parent_id = s1.id left join edu_subject s2 on c.subject_id = s2.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
